{/* ✅ Hero Background Section */}

Jendyco International

We are a family-owned business built on trust and integrity, connecting the roots of Latin America to the world. Specializing in premium coffee, cacao, and end-to-end logistics — from farm to final port.

{/* ✅ Who We Are Section */}

Who We Are

At Jendyco, we go beyond shipping — we build long-term partnerships. Our mission is to streamline global trade for small and large businesses alike, ensuring smooth, ethical, and sustainable import/export experiences.

{/* ✅ Contact Section */}

Contact Us

Have a question? We’re here to help.

Request a Quote

Let us know what you need. Whether you're importing or exporting, we’ll prepare a custom quote to make your supply chain seamless.
